```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(tidytext)
library(here)
library(janitor
```

Code below reads in and assigns multiple CSV files
```{r}
# create a list of file names to read in

lef_files <- list.files(here("data", "knb-lter-luq.20.4923052"), pattern = "*.csv")

# loop over the files, reading in, and creating a stored object with assign
for (i in seq_along(lef_files)) {
    assign(lef_files[i] %>%
             str_remove(".csv"),
           read_csv(here("data","knb-lter-luq.20.4923052", lef_files[i])))
  
}


```
